title: It's Time To Get Into Cannabis Space When Bubble Bursts With Vitaliy Katsenelson, CFA
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Vitaliy Katsenelson is Chief Investment Officer at Investment Management Associates, a Seeking Alpha contributor, as well as author of Active Value Investing and The Little Book of Sideways Markets. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss his view on the cannabis sector as a die hard value investor, why he favors brands over growers, cigarette and alcohol companies succeeding in the sector, and why avoiding carnage is only half the victory. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
